lines.text: I told you not to look after me.... Why did you do it?
--because you affect me like a mammy song.
[McQuigg ducks into a doorway when one of Scari's henchmen shoots at but purposely misses him. Scarsi emerges from behind the door]
Take a tip, Mac... change your racket.
I like my racket... and I haven't shot yet.

[exhausted]
I'd like a little sleep... but by the time I get through with the coroner and the rest of the public servants... it'll be time to go to Mass.
